BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_PGI_PRIORITY_DTL (NUM_SERVICE_PEROID,STR_FREEZE,NUM_PRIORITY_ID, NUM_CATEGORY_ID, NUM_QTR_TYPE_ID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, STR_EMP_CODE, FOR_YEAR, NUM_PRIORITY ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_PGI_PRIORITY_DTL SET NUM_SERVICE_PEROID=?,NUM_CATEGORY_ID=?,NUM_QTR_TYPE_ID=?,FOR_YEAR=?,NUM_PRIORITY=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_PRIORITY_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_PGI_PRIORITY_DTL SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_PRIORITY_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE EST_PGI_PRIORITY_DTL SET NUM_SERVICE_PEROID=?,STR_FREEZE=?,NUM_CATEGORY_ID=?,NUM_QTR_TYPE_ID=?,FOR_YEAR=?,NUM_PRIORITY=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_PRIORITY_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
